attributes.description: LOW MILEAGE Of Only 27 000 km. This Sexy And Sporty Hatch Is Ultra Cool. It Retains A Full Service History, All Books And Spare Keys. This 2020 Model Is Presented In Orange Metallic With A Black Cloth Interior. This Sexy Hot Hatch Can Be Yours Right Now! Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.

All vehicles undergo our OEM mechanical inspection as well as a third-party road worthy certificate upon delivery. Service/ maintenance plans and mechanical warranties are optional depending on the year and mileage. All trade ins are accepted subject to view. All above services are included in our on the road fees. Contact us today for an unbeatable quote.

attributes.description:
This is a 2010 Volvo S40 2.0, it’s much lighter on fuel consumption with performance as good as gold. This sedan has a delightful nature about it with greater balance too, it your best choice for a vehicle on the go loaded with features such as power steering, multi-functioning steering, electric windows, black leather seats, central locking remote, air conditioning, radio/CD player and electric mirrors. For this and more exciting specials on offers please feel free to visit a CCS dealership near you or alternatively you can download an application form for finance of the back of our website for your convenience. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client is highly appreciated. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. Our price excludes additional costs such as license, registration and COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
This vehicle is now reduced to below cost no further discount can be expected!!!
This vehicle was reduced from R99 995 to R89 995.
#10097

Your loyalty and support as our current and future client are highly appreciated. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. We are privileged to help you own what you love.
